Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Enacts the "red tape reduction act"
Summary: Requires that new administrative rules that imposes a new administrative burden on a business shall be offset by the repeal of an existing rule.
LawCode: Amd ยง202, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to enacting the "red tape reduction act"
